errorPage.title: An unexpected error occured
errorPage.message: Something went wrong. Refreshing the page might help.

404Page.pageNotFoundContent: Oh no, something went wrong. Try to enter the application <lnk>here</lnk>, through the front page

attachments.title: An error occured while uploading the file.
attachments.fileType: The file type is not allowed.

youthApplication.title: Sign up to receive your personal Summer Job Voucher
youthApplication.paragraph_1: Earning your own money is fun and easy! The Summer Job Voucher is personal and worth 325€ for the employer.

form.title: Summer Job Voucher information
form.info: Please fill in the information as it appears on your Kela card
form.schoolsPlaceholder: Choose your school from the list
form.is_unlisted_school: School not found on the list
form.termsAndConditions: I have read and accept the terms of use.
form.requiredInfo: All fields marked with * are required

errors.required: Information is missing or is incorrect
errors.minLength: The information you entered is too short
errors.maxLength: The information you entered is too long
errors.pattern: The information you entered is in an incorrect format
errors.validate: The information you entered is in an incorrect format

thankyouPage.title: Thank You!
thankyouPage.notificationTitle: Excellent! You sent your information to the Summer Job Vouchers´ digital system.
thankyouPage.notificationMessage: You have received an email with an activation link for your Summer Job Voucher, which must be activated within {{ expirationHours }} hours.
thankyouPage.goToFrontendPage: Go to the Summer Job Voucher front page

activationErrorPage.goToFrontendPage: Check your information and send again

emailInUsePage.title: Oops! The email is already in use.
emailInUsePage.notificationMessage: If you made a mistake, please wait {{ expirationHours }} hours and try again.

alreadyAssignedPage.title: Oops! A Summer Job Voucher has already been issued with the information you provided.
alreadyAssignedPage.notificationMessage: The activation link for the Summer Job Voucher has been sent to the email address you provided on the registration page.

activatedPage.title: Your Summer Job Voucher has been activated!
activatedPage.notificationMessage: Great! You have submitted your information to the Summer Job Voucher system. When your application has been handled you will receive the Summer Job Voucher and the instructions to your email.

expiredPage.title: Oops! The confirmation link has expired
expiredPage.notificationMessage: Unfortunately, it has been more than {{ expirationHours }} hours since your registration was confirmed. Please fill in the registration form again.
expiredPage.goToFrontendPage: Register yourself and send the Summer Job Voucher again

alreadyActivatedPage.title: Oops! The confirmation link is already activated.
alreadyActivatedPage.notificationMessage: The Summer Job Voucher has been sent to your email.
alreadyActivatedPage.goToFrontendPage: Register yourself and send the Summer Job Voucher again
